articles.title: DPRK Supreme People's Assembly to Be Convened
articles.content:
DPRK Supreme People's Assembly to Be Convened
 Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- The Second Session of the 13th Supreme People's Assembly of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea will be held in Pyongyang on September 25, Juche 103 (2014).
					 A relevant decision of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly was promulgated on Sept. 4.

articles.title: Notice to S. Korean Red Cross
articles.content:
Notice to S. Korean Red Cross
 Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- An institution concerned of the DPRK intercepted a south Korean inhabitant who illegally entered the DPRK via a third country.
					 According to investigation, the south Korean Kim Sang Gun residing in Kongdo Town, Ansong City, Kyonggi Province, finding it difficult to live in south Korea, left it and went to a third country. Then he headed to the north for no reason, he said. 
					
					 He frankly admitted his illegal entry into the DPRK and requested it to let him bring his family in the south so that he might live with them in the DPRK. But an institution concerned of the DPRK persuaded him and decided to send him back to the south.
					
					 In this regard, the Central Committee of the Red Cross Society of the DPRK on Friday sent the south Korean Red Cross a notice saying that it would repatriate him to the south via Panmunjom on September 11.

articles.title: DPRK Will Resolutely Counter S. Korean Group's Human Rights Racket: CPRK Secretariat
articles.content:
DPRK Will Resolutely Counter S. Korean Group's Human Rights Racket: CPRK Secretariat
 Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- The Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea (CPRK) released information bulletin No. 1073 Friday as regards the south Korean puppet group's human rights racket that has reached an extremely reckless phase.
					 The Human Rights Committee of south Korea recently announced it would establish the "north's human rights record exhibition" in order to galvanize the public opinion over human rights in the north and collect and put on display data on human rights abuses. The Committee is also said to come to the fore to kick up the anti-DPRK human rights racket.
					
					 This is another intolerable grave politically-motivated provocation of the puppet group against the DPRK and a confrontational racket to push the north-south relations to a catastrophe, the information bulletin said, and went on:
					
					 The working people are genuine masters of the state and society in the DPRK and it has become the supreme principle governing the state activities to serve the people and prioritize their dignity and interests.
					
					 All people in the society lead a worthy life with equal political rights and genuine independent dignity as human beings, regardless of positions and properties. Such country can hardly be found in any other part of the world.
					
					 There can never exist the "human rights issue" in the DPRK in the light of the nature of the social system and the policies of loving care for the people pursued by it.
					
					 South Korea is the land with the world's poorest human rights record.
					
					 Human rights issue admits of no argument at all in south Korea, a colony with its sovereignty usurped by the U.S.
					
					 If there be a human rights committee in south Korea, it should call into question human rights abuses in its own land that has turned into the world's worst tundra of human rights and if "human rights record exhibition" is to be set up, it should put on display such data and bring to justice human rights abusers.
					
					 We will never remain an on-looker to the human rights racket of the puppet group but resolutely counter it.

articles.title: Reception Given by Brazilian Ambassador
articles.content:
Reception Given by Brazilian Ambassador
 Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- Roberto Colin, Brazilian ambassador to the DPRK, gave a reception at the Taedonggang Diplomatic Club on Friday on the occasion of the 192nd anniversary of the independence of Brazil.
					 Present there on invitation were Ri Su Yong, minister of Foreign Affairs, Pak Kun Gwang, vice department director of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, Ri Kwang Gun, vice-minister of External Economic Relations, So Ho Won, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries who doubles as chairman of the DPRK-Brazil Friendship and Culture Association, officials concerned, foreign diplomatic envoys, representatives of international organizations and staff members of foreign embassies here.
					
					 Staff members of the Brazilian embassy were on hand.
					
					 The ambassador in a speech expressed the stand of Brazil on boosting the bilateral relations and cooperation. He extended warm congratulations to the Korean people on the occasion of the 66th birthday of the DPRK.
					
					 He wished the Korean people bigger successes in the socio-economic development under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Ri Su Yong in a speech said that the government and people of Brazil are achieving the sustained development of economy under the leadership of President Dilma Vana Rousseff.
					
					 The DPRK will make positive efforts to expand the multi-faceted bilateral relations with Brazil, he noted.

articles.title: Birthday Party Given for Participants in National Meeting of Educators
articles.content:
Birthday Party Given for Participants in National Meeting of Educators
 Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- There was a birthday party for the participants in the 13th National Meeting of Educators at the April 25 Hotel on Friday.
					 Han Kwang Bok, department director of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, Kim Sung Du, chairman of the Education Commission, and officials concerned were present at the birthday party together with participants who greeted their birthdays.
					
					 Han Kwang Bok said in a speech that supreme leader Kim Jong Un made sure that the national meeting of educators was held and a birthday party was given for the participants in the meeting who greeted their birthdays during the meeting.
					
					 This reflects the trust and loving care of the great father who put forward the educators as patriots who bring up the future of the country and revolution and implies the great expectation of him who wants them to successfully carry out the party's policy of making a decisive turn in education in the new century with redoubled efforts, Han noted.
					
					 She called for successfully discharging the honorable mission and duty as professional revolutionaries who take the lead in embodying the party's conception of loving the younger generation, not forgetting the present-day's honor and happiness.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Leader of Russian Political Party
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Leader of Russian Political Party
 Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, Friday received a message of greeting from G. Zhuganov, chairman of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation.
					 The message said:
					
					 Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un
					
					 I, on behalf of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation, extend sincere congratulations to you, the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people on the occasion of the 66th birthday of the DPRK.
					
					 The founding of the DPRK was an important historic event that promoted the establishment of a new system in Asia. 
					
					 Since the founding of the DPRK it has consistently pursued the line to achieve durable and stable peace on the Korean peninsula and in the rest of Asia.
					
					 The whole world at present is recognizing big successes made by the DPRK in various fields of life.
					
					 We, friends of your country, wish the Korean people new successes in the building of a justifiable socialist society.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Palestinian President
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Palestinian President
 Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a floral basket from Palestinian President Mahmoud Abbas on the occasion of the 66th birthday of the DPRK.
					 The floral basket was handed over to DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong by Ismail Ahmed Mohamed Hasan, Palestinian ambassador to the DPRK, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Friday.

articles.title: Floral Baskets Laid before Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Baskets Laid before Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- Members of the FAO, UNICEF, UNDP, WHO and WFP missions and the charge d'affaires ad interim of the Vietnamese embassy here visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on Friday on the occasion of the 66th anniversary of the founding of the DPRK.
					 They laid floral baskets before the statues and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Floral Basket, Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Un from Diplomatic Corps Here
articles.content:
Floral Basket, Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Un from Diplomatic Corps Here
 Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a floral basket and a congratulatory letter from the diplomatic corps here on the occasion of the 66th birthday of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 The floral basket and letter were handed over to DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong by Ismail Ahmed Mohamed Hasan, Palestinian ambassador to the DPRK who is the doyen of the diplomatic corps, and Liu Hongcai, Chinese ambassador to the DPRK, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Friday.

articles.title: Remains of Patriotic Martyrs Buried
articles.content:
Remains of Patriotic Martyrs Buried
 Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- Remains of eleven martyrs who dedicated their lives to the prosperity of Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's Korea and the country's reunification were buried at the Patriotic Martyrs Cemetery with due ceremonies on Thursday and Friday.
					 Among them were former general of the Korean People's Army Kim Yang Jom and former KPA officer Jo Sok Yong who rendered devoted services for the strengthening of the revolutionary armed forces of Juche and the development of national defense industry true to the Songun revolutionary leadership of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Also among them were former second secretary of the South Phyongan Provincial Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea Ri Thae Nam, former section chief of the Central Committee of the WPK Kim Hyo Sin, former president of the University of National Economy Son Song Phil and Ryang Sun Gil who rendered devoted service for the country's reunification.
					
					 Those who were honored to lead eternal lives included former director of the Control Machine Institute under the State Academy of Sciences Kim Sa Myong, former researcher of the Jongju Poultry Biological Medicine Institute Hong Wan Thae, former data researcher of the April 15 Literary Production Centre Yun Jong Chol, former writer of the Korean Scriptwriting Company Kim Se Ryun and former researcher of the Archaeological Institute of the Academy of Social Sciences Jang U Jin.
					
					 Officials concerned and bereaved families took part in the ceremonies.
					
					 Following speeches by officials concerned the remains were buried.
					
					 The participants laid wreaths and bouquets before the graves of the martyrs and observed a moment's silence in memory of the martyrs.
					
					 The bereaved family members hardened their pledges to devotedly safeguard Marshal Kim Jong Un and perform shining feats in the drive for building a thriving nation.

articles.title: New Marathon Shoes Developed in DPRK
articles.content:
New Marathon Shoes Developed in DPRK
 Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- The Athletic Apparatus Institute under the Academy of Sports Science in the DPRK recently developed a new type of marathon shoes.
					 A pair of shoes weighs 139g. The bottom of shoes is made of elastic materials and their outer rims of flexible and ventilative materials.
					
					 The new shoes, with different styles, colors and patterns, have been proven to be of help in raising marathoners' capacity for locomotion and bettering their athletic records.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Unrolls Bright Blueprint for Building Educational Power
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Unrolls Bright Blueprint for Building Educational Power
Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un clearly indicated the orientation and ways for putting education on a new higher stage as required by the reality of schooling in the country and the world trend of development of education.
					 He made public "Become Pillars Supporting Future Prosperous Korea," "The Sons and Daughters of Revolutionary Martyrs Should Become the Reliable Backbone of the Songun Revolution Who Would Stoutly Carry Forward the Lineage of Mangyongdae, the Lineage of Paektu" and other works, glorifying the educational idea of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and their exploits.
					
					 Kim Jong Un made sure that an ordinance of the Supreme People's Assembly on enforcing the universal 12-year compulsory education was promulgated at the 6th Session of the 12th SPA of the DPRK in September, Juche 101(2012), thus providing an institutional guarantee for bringing up the future generations to be backbone of Songun revolution equipped with noble spirit and a wealth of knowledge and scientific and technological talents in the era of knowledge-based economy.
					
					 He energetically led the work to firmly establish the trait of attaching importance to education throughout the country and bring about a new radical turn in education.
					
					 While visiting Pyongyang University of Architecture in November, Juche 102(2013), he gave instructions which would serve as guidelines for the university education.
					
					 He also led the work to give fullest play to the genuine advantages and tremendous vitality of the Juche-based socialist educational system.
					
					 He took one measure after another for the education of the rising generations, making sure that the state expenses for education were increased and a colossal amount of educational aid fund and stipends were sent for the children of Koreans in Japan.
					
					 He also saw to it that children's camps, schoolchildren's palaces and halls across the country were renovated.
					
					 He visited Ssuk Islet in the process of development and specified how a scientific and technological palace should look like. He thus indicated the way of building it into a study center to be visited not only by scientists, technicians, researchers and students but by all other people.
					
					 He also led the work to arrange and run scientific and technological dissemination bases at factories and enterprises so that working people can have an ample opportunity to learn modern science and technology.
					
					 Under his energetic leadership a large contingent of revolutionary talents of Juche type  are being trained to glorify Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's Korea, and the day when the country will become a highly civilized socialist nation is drawing near.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung, Founder of DPRK
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung, Founder of DPRK
 Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- The Korean people are sorely missing President Kim Il Sung, founder of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, with the approach of its anniversary (September 9).
					 Kim Il Sung launched an armed struggle to liberate Korea from Japan's colonial rule.
					
					 After the country's liberation, he had worked heart and soul to found an independent and sovereign state representing the interests of the entire Korean nation. Since the country was divided into two, he stressed the need to build a unified government without interference of outside forces and called upon the local people to get united in the efforts to build a new, democratic Korea.
					
					 He also paid attention to instituting the constitution of the new country and its name as well as national emblem, flag and anthem. He saw to it that the dignity of an independent and sovereign state was vividly reflected in the national emblem and the national flag.
					
					 Under such deep care and guidance of Kim Il Sung, the birth of the DPRK was declared to the world on September 9, 1948.
					
					 As seen above, he is the founder of the DPRK, independent in politics, self-supporting in the economy and self-reliant in national defence, as well as the father of socialist Korea.

articles.title: U.S. Forces in S. Korea Are Cancer-like Entity: Institute for Disarmament and Peace
articles.content:
U.S. Forces in S. Korea Are Cancer-like Entity: Institute for Disarmament and Peace
 Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Institute for Disarmament and Peace of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the DPRK released the following statement Friday on the lapse of 69 years since the U.S. occupied south Korea:
					 The upcoming September 8 marks 69 years since the U.S. forces occupied south Korea.
					
					 After illegally occupying south Korea under the pretext of "disarming the Japanese army" following Japan's unconditional surrender at the end of the Second World War, the U.S. forces in south Korea took the lead in carrying out Washington's strategy for escalating confrontation and tensions on the Korean peninsula and in the rest of Northeast Asia during the Cold War.
					
					 The landscape of the relations in Northeast Asia has undergone a drastic change since the demise of the Cold War but the U.S. forces are still present in south Korea. This cannot but be an anachronistic mistake.
					
					 What is most serious in the activities conducted by the U.S. forces in south Korea are the joint military exercises that cause an evil cycle of tensions on the peninsula.
					
					 The U.S. and the puppet forces in south Korea try to justify those joint military exercises as "annual and defensive ones" but even the Western countries admit that they pose a serious threat to peace and security on the peninsula. The U.S.-led joint military exercises can never be tolerated as they are very dangerous saber-rattling that can cause catastrophic consequences on the peninsula in the light of their nature, scale and frequency.
					
					Before and after the Cold War there took place in Europe frequent joint military exercises between the eastern and western blocs but coercive measures were taken to restrict their scale. Each party undertook not to carry out simultaneously more than three military activities, each involving over 13 000 troops. No party was allowed to carry out within two calendar years more than one military activity involving over 40,000 troops. The 1986 Stockholm CSBM Document stated that they would refrain from the threat or use of force against any state, regardless of that state's political, social, economic or cultural system. No words like drills for occupying capital of other country and drills for a preemptive nuclear attack could ever be found. More importantly, normal state-to-state relations existed among regional countries and regular communications channel existed.
					
					But the joint military exercises under various codenames which the U.S. forces in south Korea stage in collusion with the south Korean puppet forces number more than 40 each year and the troops involved in them reach over 500,000.
					
					 They apply even the "tailored deterrence strategy" aimed at a preemptive nuclear attack on the DPRK and openly stage the drill of "occupying Pyongyang" with the involvement of strategic nuclear bombers, nuclear carrier and nuclear-powered submarines.
					
					 As a retaliation against the U.S. step taken in 2001 to adopt it as its policy to mount a preemptive nuclear attack on the DPRK, the latter was compelled to have access to nuclear weapons. As the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces made a decision to apply the preemptive nuclear attack on the DPRK to a substantial operation in 2012, the DPRK was also compelled to acquire preemptive nuclear attack capabilities to cope with it.
					
					 Now on the Korean peninsula the Armistice Agreement was nullified and the channel for communication is in a fragile state due to the U.S., to say nothing of normalizing relations between the two hostile parties. Under this situation the confrontation between the two sides armed with nuclear weapons can easily lead to the misunderstanding of the other party and nuclear disaster. This indicates that the danger of joint military exercises which the U.S. regularly stage on the peninsula is incomparably bigger than in any other region.
					
					 The joint military exercises are held on the peninsula, not in the land of the U.S. because of the aggressive nature of the U.S. forces in south Korea.
					
					 The U.S. should have sought the settlement through negotiation of the questions of the withdrawal of all foreign forces from Korea, the peaceful settlement of the Korean question within 3 months and have had its forces withdrawn from south Korea as was stipulated in the 1953 Korean Armistice Agreement. It was also obliged to immediately implement the resolution made at the 30th Session of the UN General Assembly in 1975 that called for disbanding the "UN Command" and pulling the U.S. forces out of south Korea.
					
					 In 1992 the north-south agreement was adopted and an alternative arrangement was also provided as requested by the U.S. And the north and the south agreed on their political will and ways for solving the question of the country's reunification and peace by the Koreans themselves in the June 15 north-south joint declaration in 2000 and the October 4 declaration in 2007. This left the U.S. with no justifications to keep its forces in south Korea. It is, therefore, self-evident that had the U.S. forces pulled out of south Korea, the situation would not have deteriorated due to the military exercises on the peninsula.
					
					 But the U.S. concluded the "mutual defense treaty" with south Korea, introduced nuclear weapons to south Korea, formed south Korea-U.S. "Combined Forces Command", staged Team Spirit, Key Resolve, Foal Eagle and Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises and attempted to reorganize the "UN Command" on an expansion basis, thus highlighting the aggressive nature of its forces in south Korea.
					
					 The U.S. forces in south Korea are not under the control of the UN nor peace-keeping forces sent to dispute-torn areas under the UN resolutions. The purpose of their presence in south Korea and the program of their operations are all aimed to invade the DPRK and hold a military edge in Northeast Asia.
					
					 They are the root cause of instability not only on the Korean peninsula but in the rest of Northeast Asia. To cope with the joint naval exercises staged among the U.S., Japan and south Korea every year from 2012, neighboring countries also staged regular joint naval military exercises in waters around the peninsula. The U.S. attempt to deploy in south Korea THAAD under the pretext of "protecting" its forces in south Korea has sparked off a serious concern among neighboring countries that south Korea will become the target of a nuclear attack by other countries, thereby creating a serious situation.
					
					 As the U.S. increases its military pressure on the DPRK with its forces in south Korea as a main player, the DPRK is also taking measures for self-defence on an annual and regular basis.
					
					 Not only the neighboring countries but the UN and the international community should pay a due attention to the joint military exercises seriously threatening the peace and security on the peninsula and in the region and the U.S. forces in south Korea which play a key role in them.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Bringing about Decisive Turn in Education
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Bringing about Decisive Turn in Education
 Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- The 13th meeting of educators will be held here amid the deep concern and great expectation of the party and the state.
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday in an editorial calls upon all the participants in the meeting and educators across the country to bear in mind the historic significance of the meeting and make the meeting an occasion in bringing about a decisive turn in the development of the education, true to the intention of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 In order to bring about a decisive turn in education, it is necessary to thoroughly establish the trait of attaching importance to education throughout the country and raise a strong wind of giving priority to education, the editorial says, adding:
					
					 All the people should turn out to help the nation's education make progress.
					
					 Education is a noble patriotic work to which not only educators but also all members of the society should direct efforts.
					
					 The whole party and country and all the people should attach importance to education, direct primary efforts to its development and provide conditions necessary for the education of rising generation on a priority basis.
					
					 All officials and other people should regard education as their own work and render material and moral assistance to education as befitting the parents who entrust their children to teachers.
					
					 They should firmly establish a social atmosphere of respecting and preferentially treating teachers and always pay deep attention to the education of the rising generation.
					
					 It is necessary to channel great efforts into constructing school buildings and solving the shortage of classrooms in conformity with the enforcement of the universal 12-year compulsory education as an immediate task. To this end, provincial, city and county people's committees and organizations supporting schools should increase their role.
					
					 The Juche-oriented education will surely reach the world's highest eminence as there are the wise leadership of the party, the might of the world's best socialist educational system and the large contingent of revolutionary educators loyal to the party and the leader, the country and its people, the editorial concludes.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Observes Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Observes Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work
 Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Friday carries an article on the occasion of the 6th anniversary of the publication of leader Kim Jong Il's work "The Democratic People's Republic of Korea Is a Juche-Oriented Socialist State with Invincible Might".
					 The work, published on Sept. 5, Juche 97 (2008), says that the invincible might of the DPRK lies in defending and eternally glorifying the Juche-oriented nation-building idea of President Kim Il Sung and his exploits.
					
					 In the work Kim Jong Il proudly reviewed the glorious 60-year long history of the DPRK in which it covered the path of victory and glory under the wise guidance of the party and the leader and clarified the popular and independent nature and invincible might of the DPRK which applied the Juche idea to the nation-building and state activities and tasks and ways to dynamically accelerate the building of a thriving nation, the article says.
					
					 The article goes on: He, loyal to the idea and cause of Kim Il Sung, led the Korean revolution to victory, weathering stern ordeals and tempests of history with his original Songun revolutionary leadership.
					
					 Thanks to his Songun revolutionary leadership and Songun politics the DPRK could emerge a full-fledged nuclear weapons state which no aggressor dares provoke and a socialist military power having matchless revolutionary armed forces and powerful national defence industry. 
					
					 His work serves as a banner which instills into the service personnel and people national pride and self-confidence that they won one victory after another, making the history of an invincible power under the leadership of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, the article concludes.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Suppression of Teachers Flayed
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Suppression of Teachers Flayed
 Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- A strong protest is being sparked off in south Korea against the puppet police's application of a warrant of arrest for members of the Teachers Union (Jongyojo) who published a declaration on the situation in demand of the probe into the truth about the ferry Sewol disaster and the resignation of the puppet regime, according to Chamsesang, an internet paper of south Korea.
					 Teachers of Jongyojo who took part in the campaign for publishing the declaration on the situation held a press conference at Kwanghwamun plaza in Seoul on Sept. 2 at which they protested against the police's suppression.
					
					 They condemned the present chief executive for having not yet met with the bereaved families and not showing an elementary sense of obligation towards them.
					
					 They demanded the regime institute a special law on the ferry Sewol accident granting the right to investigate and indict those responsible for the disaster as desired by the bereaved families.
					
					 They urged it to lift at once the step for arresting teachers.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Accused of Opening Rice Market
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Accused of Opening Rice Market
 Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- Voice of People, an internet paper of south Korea, in an editorial on Sept. 3 denounced the puppet authorities for fully opening the rice market, a humiliating action.
					 The editorial recalled that peasants driven into a crisis caused by the opening of the rice market declared a September action.
					
					 They said they would hold a peasants rally, sit-in strike outside Chongwadae, etc. in all parts of south Korea on Sept. 18, the editorial said.
					
					 Peasants are demanding a total halt to unilaterally opening the rice market, it noted.
					
					 It condemned the "government's" decision on opening the rice market as one made without an agreement with anyone and the most foolish choice.
					
					 The "government's" move will deal a deadly blow at agriculture on this land and remain an indelible crime, it warned.
					
					 It called on the people to express positive solidarity with the peasants in their action to protect the rice market.

articles.title: Corruption within S. Korean Puppet Army Disclosed
articles.content:
Corruption within S. Korean Puppet Army Disclosed
 Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- The south Korean newspaper Hangyore in an editorial on Sept. 3 brought to light various forms of accidents and scandals in the puppet army.
					 Accidents and scandals taking place in army units in an unbroken chain these days are appalling and shocking, the editorial noted, adding: This is the real picture of the army.
					
					 At the paratrooper group on Sept. 2, ten privates had remained in custody for one hour and 40 minutes, their knees bent and with air-tight hempen hoods put on their heads and their hands bound on their backs under the pretext of letting them have POWs experience. This practice left two of them dead.
					
					 The commander of the First Army Corps left the area under its control without notice in June and was blind drunk only to be accused by civilians but the military authorities deliberately concealed it, the editorial said, holding the high-ranking officers of the military responsible for the ceaseless accidents and scandals.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Military Accused of Speaking Ill of North's Dispatch of Cheerleading Squad
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Military Accused of Speaking Ill of North's Dispatch of Cheerleading Squad
 Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- The puppet military group of south Korea spoke ill of the DPRK's decision to dispatch cheerleading squad to the 17th Asiad, according to the south Korean CBS.
					 It was disclosed that the room of educational policy-maker of the puppet Ministry of Defense carried a brainwashing material titled "Truth behind controversy over the north's dispatch of cheerleading squad" on Defense Daily on Sept. 1 and forced all the officers and men to read the article the next day.
					
					 The DPRK officially made public on July 7 that it would send players group and cheerleading squad to the 17th Asiad due in Inchon and made brisk preparations.
					
					 However, the puppet group responded to it with such vitriolic languages as "group of political operatives to the south", "a squad to spark a conflict in south Korea" and "double-dealing tactics of reconciliation and war".
					
					 At the north-south working-level talks for discussing the north's participation in the Games, the south side took issue with even the scope of the cheerleading squad and its composition and found fault with the size of flags to be used by the cheerleading squad, openly making provocations.
					
					 It even raised the issue of expenses which the DPRK side did not mention, making a mockery of the DPRK and leading the talk to a rupture in the end.
					
					 The puppet forces' despicable behavior touched off resentment among people of various circles in south Korea immediately.
					
					 Much upset by this, the puppet authorities impudently claimed they were not responsible for what happened, talking about "distorted assertions".
					
					 But the recent disclosure of the above-said material clearly proved that the puppet group's mud-slinging was true.
					
					 It, at the same time, indicates that the puppet group is making desperate efforts to evade the responsibility for the prevailing situation.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Forces Censured for Blocking Institution of Special Law
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Forces Censured for Blocking Institution of Special Law
 Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- Professors and students of different universities of south Korea waged an action in Seoul on September 3 denouncing the puppet forces for blocking the institution of a special law on the ferry Sewol, according to Voice of People, an internet paper of south Korea.
					 They gathered at Kwanghwamun plaza while demonstrating in different parts of Seoul and held a rally.
					
					 Speakers at the rally said that it is quite natural to thoroughly probe the truth about the ferry Sewol disaster and only doing so is the minimum starting point to appease the soul of the victims and help the bereaved families survive.
					
					 They condemned the "Saenuri Party" for insisting on the special inspection system before the bereaved families and letting loose a spate of invectives that it could not take a step back from this stand.
					
					 The special inspection system cannot investigate without restriction those involved in the case within Chongwadae and intelligence organs as it is a hypocritical one to block the thoroughgoing probe into the truth, they held.
					
					 They said they would turn out in the drive to thoroughly probe the truth about the disaster and build a new society.
					
					 At the end of the rally the participants went to the place where the bereaved families were staging a sit-in strike.
					
					 Student representatives broke through the police lines, met with the bereaved families and positively encouraged them.

articles.title: Founding Anniversary of DPRK Marked by Bulgarian Organization
articles.content:
Founding Anniversary of DPRK Marked by Bulgarian Organization
 Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- The Bulgaria-Korea Friendship Association issued a bulletin on August 28 on the occasion of the 66th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 The bulletin carried an article titled "Korea's reunification, most urgent task" which said:
					
					 The Korean peninsula divided into the north and the south due to foreign forces still remains the most acute hotspot in the world.
					
					 The history of Korea's division began with the U.S. forces' occupation of south Korea in September, 1945 after the liberation of the country and it is still divided.
					
					 The DPRK was founded and led by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and is now led by Marshal Kim Jong Un. It advanced many proposals for the reunification of the country and has made tireless efforts to carry them out.
					
					 Kim Il Sung advanced the three principles of national reunification, the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo and the ten-point programme of the great unity of the whole nation and Kim Jong Il held the historic north-south summits and provided the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.
					
					 After taking office in 2008, Lee Myung Bak of south Korea totally denied the north-south agreements and blocked the cooperative relations between the north and the south.
					
					 Park Geun Hye is also pursuing the policy following the U.S.
					
					 The biggest stumbling block in the way of reunifying Korea is that the U.S. forces remain in south Korea to keep their strategic position in Northeast Asia.
					
					 It is also that the successive rulers of south Korea are seeking the "unification through absorption" by following the U.S.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats Introduced by Russian Media
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats Introduced by Russian Media
 Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- Russian media posted special write-ups on their websites between August 25 and 30 on the occasion of the Day of Songun in the DPRK.
					 Internet magazine Hanber Journal posted articles titled "Eternal banner of Songun" and "Day of Songun in DPRK" illustrated with a portrait of smiling leader Kim Jong Il, photos dealing with the Songun leadership feats of President Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un and photos introducing the might of the heroic Korean People's Army.
					
					 The articles said that after inspecting the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su Guards 105th Tank Division of the Korean People's Army on August 25, 1960, the first inspection for his Songun revolutionary leadership, Kim Jong Il turned the Workers' Party of Korea, the KPA and the DPRK into the guiding force of the cause of Songun, matchless combat ranks, political and military power, satellite manufacturer and launcher and nuclear weapons state.
					
					 The feats he performed by providing the eternal foundation for the prosperity of socialist Korea under his outstanding and tested Songun leadership will remain shining for all ages, they stressed.
					
					 Articles introducing his Songun leadership feats were posted on internet magazine Mar 12, internet TV Krasnoe Televidenie and websites of the Rostov Association for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism of Russia, the Russian Group for Solidarity with the DPRK, the Russian Kirov Association for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Crimean Association for the Study of the Juche Idea.

articles.title: Seminars Held Abroad
articles.content:
Seminars Held Abroad
 Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- Seminars were held at the Diversity Party of Indonesia, the Dwi Mitra Perkasa Company of Indonesia, the Nigerian Group for the Study of the Juche Philosophy and the New Communist Party of Britain between August 27 and 29 on the occasion of the 66th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 Displayed at the venues of the seminars were works of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un and books introducing the DPRK.
					
					 The secretary general of the National Leading Council of the Diversity Party of Indonesia said that the Korean people became the full-fledged master of the independent and sovereign state as Kim Il Sung founded the DPRK.
					
					 Under the leadership of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il the DPRK turned into the invincible socialist power and a satellite manufacturer and launcher and a nuclear weapons state recognized by the world, he noted, wishing the Korean people greater successes in building a thriving socialist nation under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The chairman of the Nigerian Group for the Study of the Juche Philosophy praised Kim Il Sung, the eternal President of the DPRK, as the father of the nation building who founded and led the first people's country in the history of the Korean nation spanning five thousands of years and the invincible country unfazed by all storms of history.
					
					 The general secretary of the New Community Party of Britain lauded Kim Il Sung as the benevolent leader of the people who performed the precious feats which will shine long for the Korean people and progressive mankind all his life after being born as the son of the people.
					
					 His feats performed in the nation building threw their rays more brightly thanks to the Songun revolutionary leadership of Kim Jong Il and are being successfully carried forward by Kim Jong Un, the general secretary added.

articles.title: Se convocara la asamblea popular suprema de RPDC
articles.content:
Se convocara la asamblea popular suprema de RPDC
Pyongyang, 5 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Segun un decreto del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea publicado el dia 4, se convocara el 25 de septiembre del 103 (2014) de la Era Juche en esta capital el segundo periodo de sesiones de la XIII Legislatura de la APS de la RPDC.

articles.title: CC de ACR de RPDC envia aviso a entidad homologa surcoreana
articles.content:
CC de ACR de RPDC envia aviso a entidad homologa surcoreana
Pyongyang, 5 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Un organo competente de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea intercepto a un habitante surcoreano que entro ilegalmente en la RPDC por via del tercer pais.
					Segun el resultado de la investigacion, el surcoreano se nombra Kim Sang Gun y es residente de la cabeza de Kongdo de la ciudad de Ansong de la provincia de Kyonggi.
					
					El dijo que salio al tercer pais impotente de ganarse la vida en el Sur de Corea y entro sin premeditacion en el Norte de Corea.
					
					Reconocio francamente su entrada ilegal y pidio que le permitiera buscar a su esposa e hijo en el Sur de Corea y convivir con ellos en la RPDC.
					
					El organo competente de la RPDC le persuadio y decidio devolverlo al Sur de Corea donde le esperan sus familiares.
					
					Al respecto, el Comite Central de la Asociacion de la Cruz Roja de la RPDC envio el dia 5 a la Sociedad de la Cruz Roja del Sur de Corea una nota notificando entregar el dia 11 por via de Phanmunjom a la parte Sur a ese habitante surcoreano.

articles.title: CRPP condena la febril campana de DDHH contra la RPDC
articles.content:
CRPP condena la febril campana de DDHH contra la RPDC
Pyongyang, 5 de septiembre (ACNC) -- En relacion con que en estos dias, llega a la fase extremada la campana anti-Republica Popular Democratica de Corea de la banda titere surcoreana en la esfera de DDHH, el Secretariado del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria hizo publica el dia 5 la informacion no.1073.
					Hace poco, el comite surcoreano de derechos humanos decidio instaurar la "exposicion de registros de los derechos humanos del Norte de Corea" para "despertar la atencion al problema de DDHH del Norte de Corea". Y anuncio que recogera y exhibira alli los "datos referentes a la violacion de DDHH", comienza la nota y continua:
					
					Asi el comite surcoreano expuso abiertamente su intento de intensificar la campana de DDHH anti-RPDC.
					
					Esto es otra imperdonable provocacion politica contra la RPDC y una locura conflictiva que lleva las relaciones intercoreanas a la fase catastrofica.
					
					En la RPDC, las masas trabajadoras son duenas verdaderas del Estado y la sociedad y el Estado mantiene como su maximo principio servir para ellas y garantizar con preferencia su dignidad e intereses.
					
					La RPDC es el unico pais del mundo donde todos los miembros de la sociedad tienen iguales derechos politicos independientemente de sus cargos y sin distingos de posiciones sociales y propiedades y viven dignamente como hombres independientes.
					
					En nuestro pais no puede haber nunca el "problema de DDHH" tanto en vista del caracter connatural de su regimen como a la luz de las politicas de amor al pueblo.
					
					Es el Sur de Corea donde existen serios problemas de DDHH.
					
					No cabe discutir los DDHH en el Sur de Corea que entrego en bandeja su "soberania" a Estados Unidos.
					
					Si hay en el Sur de Corea el llamado comite de DDHH, este debe cuestionar primero los crimenes anti-DDHH de su casa convertida en un infierno para los DDHH de talla mundial.
					
					Si se establece la arriba citada "exposicion", habria que exhibir los datos de tales crimenes y juzgar a los violadores de DDHH.
					
					Haremos frente rotundo a la cada dia mas recrudescente campana anti-RPDC en el campo de DDHH.

articles.title: Embajador brasileno ofrece banquete por el dia de independencia
articles.content:
Embajador brasileno ofrece banquete por el dia de independencia
Pyongyang, 5 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 192o aniversario de la independencia de Brasil, el embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario de la Republica Federativa de Brasil en Corea, Roberto Colin, ofrecio el dia 5 un banquete en el Club para el Cuerpo Diplomatico Taedonggang.
					A la ocasion fueron invitados el canciller Ri Su Yong, el subjefe de departamento del CC del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Pak Kun Gwang, el viceministro de Relaciones Economicas con el Extranjero, Ri Kwang Gun, el vicepresidente del Comite de Relaciones Culturales con el Extranjero y presidente de la Asociacion de Amistad y Cultura Corea-Brasil, So Ho Won, y otros funcionarios, los representantes diplomaticos de varios paises y de organizaciones internacionales acreditados en Corea.
					
					Participaron en la ocasion los miembros de la Embajada de Brasil.
					
					El embajador brasileno expreso la posicion de su pais de desarrollar mas las relaciones bilaterales y la cooperacion entre los dos paises y envio calidas felicitaciones al pueblo coreano con motivo del 66o aniversario de la fundacion de la RPDC.
					
					Deseo que bajo la direccion de Su Excelencia Mariscal Kim Jong Un, el pueblo coreano logre mayores exitos en el desarrollo socio-economico.
					
					El canciller coreano apunto que bajo la direccion de Su Excelencia Presidenta Dilma Rousseff, el gobierno y el pueblo de Brasil logran el desarrollo sostenido de la economia.
					
					Enfatizo que en el futuro tambien, la RPDC se esforzara ingentemente por ampliar en todos los aspectos las relaciones bilaterales con Brasil.

articles.title: Tiene lugar acto de felicitacion de cumpleanos de participantes en conferencia
articles.content:
Tiene lugar acto de felicitacion de cumpleanos de participantes en conferencia
Pyongyang, 5 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 5 en el Hotel 25 de Abril el acto de felicitacion de cumpleanos de participantes en la 13a conferencia nacional de funcionarios de ensenanza.
					A la ocasion asistieron el jefe de departamento del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Han Kwang Bok, el presidente del Comite de Educacion, Kim Sung Du, y otros funcionarios, junto con los participantes en la conferencia que celebran sus cumpleanos.
					
					Al hacer uso de la palabra, Han dijo que el Mariscal Kim Jong Un tomo la iniciativa de preparar la conferencia e instruyo ofrecer un banquete en honor de los participantes que acogen sus cumpleanos durante el conclave.
					
					En tales medidas benevolas se expresan la confianza del Mariscal, que presenta a los funcionarios de ensenanza como patriotas que forman las futuras generaciones de la patria y la revolucion, y su esperanza de que ellos materialicen cabalmente la orientacion del partido de imprimir viraje en la educacion en el nuevo siglo, apunto.
					
					Sin olvidar el honor y la felicidad de hoy, los presentes aqui deben cumplir su mision de revolucionario profesional que materializa al frente el amor del partido por las generaciones venideras y el futuro, concluyo.
